summary: This release makes it easier than ever to get started with your own blog by adding a helpful setup page for new tenants. We've also enhanced our public journey page with more historical milestones and visual timelines, giving you a clearer view of Grove's growth. Under the hood, we've cleaned up some data tracking and deployment processes to keep everything running smoothly.

features: Add setup page for empty tenant blogs
add test coverage tracking to journey page
add TypeScript migration and documentation sections
add stacked language bars to growth timeline
add historical milestones and show versions in growth chart
fixes: exclude .svelte-kit from code counts and correct historical data
update landing deployment to trigger on auto-tag workflow
